title: Star Hospital, Hojai
description: Complete Medical Gas Pipeline Installation including Air & Vacuum Plants. Fully equipped with modern ICU systems and 70-bed capacity. Delivered with optimal safety and operational efficiency.
actualWorkTitle: Medical Gas Pipeline Installation at Star Hospital
actualWorkDesc: Complete Medical Gas Pipeline Installation including Air & Vacuum Plants. Fully equipped with modern ICU systems and 70-bed capacity.Delivered with optimal safety and operational efficiency.

bullets: 70-bed capacity multi-speciality hospital
Installation of oxygen, medical air, and vacuum pipelines
Integrated plant room with vacuum & air compressors
Smart supervision system for regulation and safety
Completed within stipulated timelines

descBlocks.text: Alex Healthcare System carried out a full-scale Medical Gas Pipeline System (MGPS) installation at Star Hospital, Hojai. This included end-to-end engineering, from pipeline layout planning to final plant commissioning.
The project ensured consistent, safe delivery of life-supporting gases across all departments, contributing to enhanced critical care efficiency and hospital readiness.

descBlocks.text: This project included the complete medical gas pipeline infrastructure for Kapili Hospital. Alex Healthcare delivered a robust pipeline network tailored to the hospitalâ€™s unique layout and workflow.

title: Health Planet Hospital (Islam Sir)

descBlocks.text: Alex Healthcare executed one of its flagship modular OT projects at Health Planet Hospital. The surgical spaces were customized for safety, sterility, and smart space optimization.
Alongside OT setups, patient beds were integrated with medical utilities ensuring readiness for day-to-day operations across wards.

descBlocks.text: Alex Healthcare carried out modular installations for ICUs across several hospitals, focusing on functionality, layout flexibility, and 24/7 support systems.
The result was smarter ICU environments with better staff accessibility, patient support, and efficient infrastructure deployment.

title: Vacuum Pump Installations

bullets: MGPS (Medical Gas Pipeline System) installation for hospitals

descBlocks.text: Alex Healthcare is a trusted partner in deploying compliant and efficient MGPS and fire safety infrastructure across healthcare facilities. From planning to implementation, every detail is aligned with regulatory standards.
Our solutions not only enable smooth hospital operations but also support institutions in acquiring necessary government clearances like Fire Fighting NOC.
